channel.title: RSC Client Rewrite
channel.description:
I am rewriting parts of the rsc client, to learn more about the client also to make the client better to understand for me and other people..
This project is open to anyone who wants to help or anything like that.. I really really do hate the way runescape classic client is designed and How the way yours just coupe with it and do nothing about this.. So here is a example of what I am doing by rewriting how the banking is done And designing it my own way for me and other people to understand
http://pastie.org/private/ojflhudfngbi3pnm0ztq
[img]http://imgur.com/xgZ06.png[/img] Mark :)

item.title: RSC Client Rewrite
item.dc:creator: @Motaro Motaro
item.description:
@Motaro wrote:

I say go ahead and create an RSC server identical to RSC, then work off of that.

Honestly, I think replicating RSC should be first priority for people who are interested in making a server.

RSCD was on the right track…

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Client Rewrite
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

If you plan on creating a rsc server then that makes sense. If its just a project I suggest you do something different and creative.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Client Rewrite
item.dc:creator: @Salty_FIsh Salty FIsh
item.description:
@Salty_FIsh wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:8, topic:389007”]Also have you every thought of making a different UI for the client. Instead of having the original bank screen maybe making your own bank screen/trade screen etc. Just a thought. I think it would be nice if someone made their own design for it.[/quote]Well I’ve thought about it myself, But then if someone makes a private server with the new screen and etc there is always the arguments of

“I want to play a rsc server!!! this is not a rsc server!!!”

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Client Rewrite
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

Also have you every thought of making a different UI for the client. Instead of having the original bank screen maybe making your own bank screen/trade screen etc. Just a thought. I think it would be nice if someone made their own design for it.

Read full topic

item.title: RSC Client Rewrite
item.dc:creator: @Salty_FIsh Salty FIsh
item.description:
@Salty_FIsh wrote:

[quote=“IlikeArrays, post:6, topic:389007”]If you rewrite the client and edit the sprites/models wouldn’t you be able to run a legal server?[/quote]Well yes, copyright can be bypassed easy once I’ve completed the rewrite and etc… People say “rewriting the rsc client is impossible”

But nothing says we can edit it removing the stupid stuff jagex added well when I say stupid stuff rsc client was built in 2000-2003, seeming as everything has not advanced since then programming and different ways of going around stuff we can customize there client remove there stupid shit add it with better features/functionality… But as of the sprites you could always add a 1x1 pixel of a pink/black mark in there say you did them yourself see? is this on the rsc sprites and etc.
But a long and painful task

Read full topic

item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

If you rewrite the client and edit the sprites/models wouldn’t you be able to run a legal server?

Oh hai mark

item.title: RSC Client Rewrite
item.dc:creator: @Salty_FIsh Salty FIsh
item.description:
@Salty_FIsh wrote:

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:2, topic:389007”]Heres someone who can’t let go…[/quote]Actually I can let go, I just cba with doing nothing all day seeming as I’ve basicly done everything I’ve wanted to

Like create a streaming website like no other what uses megaupload exploits and it allows the movies to stream/download at 1mb/s without no 45 second time wait or a premium account

dgxpy.jpg1666×923

CpaEC.jpg999×952


I created a password checker for runescape what checks through a proxy list first to find the proxys what are not denied from the runescape system then checks the password and etc

0lmUN.png766×584

I’ve created a rs2 bot.

vS5v8.jpg1514×977


What connects to a custom server what I’ve built when a bot is executed and etc what allows people to control there bots via mobile devices or etc…

I’ve built a ASM renamer…
A* path finder and etc

I get bored a lot so if I want to do rsc I can do.

Read full topic
